author: Joseph Young
title: Why U.S. Coronavirus Recovery Can Follow China’s Successful Lead
description: Starbucks thinks the U.S. is seeing a similar trend to China as the coronavirus pandemic spreads rapidly across the world. The post Why U.S. Coronavirus Recovery Can Follow China’s Successful Lead appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Starbucks CEO Kevin Johnson sees the U.S. going through the same trend as China in dealing with coronavirus.
  • China reopened factories and most businesses 9 weeks after the virus outbreak was reported.
